full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Details

| Term | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | English to French Translation, Editing and Comparative Editing Services |
| **Reference** | cb-8459-23786499 |
| **Amendment** | 7 |
| **Solicitation** | 5Z011-24-0076 |
| **Publication Date** | August 24, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | October 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST |
| **Status** | Expired |

## Scope of Work

Library and Archives Canada is seeking to establish a contract for English to French translation, editing, and comparative editing services. The services will be provided on an “as and when requested” basis for a period of one year, with the option to extend the contract by one year for a total of four years.

## Key Highlights

* The contract will be awarded through a competitive process using a Request for Proposal (RFP) methodology.
* The services will be carried out in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The selected contractor will be required to provide high-quality translation services in French, including editing and comparative editing services.
* The contractor must have expertise in translation services and be able to meet the requirements of the client.
* The services will be provided in accordance with the specifications outlined in the RFP document.

## Contract Details

| Term | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Duration** | One year, with the option to extend for up to three years |
| **Procurement Category** | Services - SRV |
| **Notices Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Trade Agreements** | CFTA, WTO GPA |

## Contact Information

* **Name**: ANNE-MARIE AUBRY
* **Email**: [receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 716-2173
* **Address**: 550 de la Cité Boulevard, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0N4
